content: You Michelob Ultra fascists with your narrow waists and your active lifestyles, you fertility goddess fuckwads with your Concern For the Children, you public health wonks intent on Extending Our Lifespans For No Good Goddamn Reason — all of you. Now look at us. We’re all like an ass-hair away from meat-cleavering our way through the fucking office till the SWAT team rappels down the side of the fucking building and mows us down.
